excerpt: This vegan meatball sub is the perfect comfort food! Loaded with protein-packed veggie balls, rich marinara sauce, and melted vegan cheese, this sandwich is sure to be a crowd-pleaser.
instructions: In a small bowl, mix together ground flaxseed and water. Set aside for 5 minutes to thicken.
In a large mixing bowl, add vegan meatballs and flaxseed mixture. Mix until well combined.
Roll mixture into 1-inch balls and place on a greased baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes.
Heat marinara sauce in a small saucepan on low heat.
Slice sub rolls in half and place vegan mozzarella cheese on bottom half of each roll.
Place vegan meatballs on top of cheese and pour the warm marinara sauce over the top.
Add additional vegan mozzarella cheese on top of marinara sauce.
Place both sandwich halves (with tops still off) in the preheated oven for 5-10 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Remove from oven and place tops of sub rolls back onto the sandwich.
